additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Milk Solids, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Raising Agent (500), Emulsifiers (Soy Lecithin, 476), Hydrolysed Milk Protein, Flavours.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Milk and Soy. Milk Chocolate (55%), Honeycomb Crunchie (45%). Milk Chocolate Contains Cocoa Solids 26%, Milk Solids 23%.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Tree Nuts, May Be Present Peanuts, May Be Present Wheat, Contains Soy, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: This pack is for retail sale intact. Individual units not to be sold separately.

description: 12 Crunchie bar treats perfect for sharing or snacking! Crunchie bar offers you a 'sweet' hit when you need an energising treat throughout the day. It is delicious with golden honeycomb covered in Cadbury milk chocolate. Also available in a 50g bar, 200g block and 350g block.
name: Crunchie Chocolate Bar Multipack 12 Treats
